Headline: #7 Harrison Temporary Westbound Reroute near Harrison/Loomis
ShortDescription: Westbound 7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted via Harrison, Loomis, Van Buren, Ashland, and Harrison due to, street blockage near Harrison/Loomis.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted via Harrison, Loomis, Van Buren, Ashland, and Harrison due to, street blockage near Harrison/Loomis.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Southbound #6 Jackson Park Express Reroute near Stony Island/57th
ShortDescription: SB 6 Jackson Park Exp. buses are temp. rerouted via Hyde Park, 57th, Lake Shore Dr., Marquette, and Stony Island, due to street blockage near Stony Island/57th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Hyde Park, 57th, Lake Shore Drive, Marquette, and Stony Island, due to street blockage near Stony Island/57th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
